mapper.select: SELECT THEATER_CODE theaterCode, THEATER_NAME theaterName, THEATER_ADDR theaterAddr, LOCATION_X locationX, LOCATION_Y locationY FROM TB_THEATER

SELECT SCREENING_ID screeningId, SCREEN_CODE screenCode, STARTTIME startTime, ENDTIME endTime, STARTDATE startDate, ENDDATE endDate, MOVIE_CODE movieCode, THEATER_CODE theaterCode FROM TB_MOVIE_SCHEDULE WHERE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode} AND THEATER_CODE = #{theaterCode} AND ( (#{startDate} BETWEEN STARTDATE AND ENDDATE) OR (#{endDate} BETWEEN STARTDATE AND ENDDATE) OR (STARTDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (ENDDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) ) ORDER BY STARTTIME ASC

SELECT MS.SCREENING_ID screeningId, MS.SCREEN_CODE screenCode, MS.STARTTIME startTime, MS.ENDTIME endTime, MS.STARTDATE startDate, MS.ENDDATE endDate, MS.MOVIE_CODE movieCode, MS.THEATER_CODE theaterCode, M.MOVIE_TITLE movieTitle, M.RATING rating FROM TB_MOVIE_SCHEDULE MS INNER JOIN TB_MOVIE M ON MS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE MS.THEATER_CODE = #{theaterCode} AND #{date} BETWEEN MS.STARTDATE AND MS.ENDDATE ORDER BY MS.STARTTIME ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS schedule_count FROM TB_MOVIE_SCHEDULE MS JOIN TB_SCREEN S ON MS.SCREEN_CODE = S.SCREEN_CODE JOIN TB_THEATER T ON MS.THEATER_CODE = T.THEATER_CODE WHERE T.THEATER_CODE = #{theaterCode} AND MS.SCREEN_CODE = #{screenCode} AND ( (#{startDate} < MS.ENDDATE AND #{endDate} > MS.STARTDATE) OR (#{startDate} = MS.STARTDATE AND #{startTime} < MS.ENDTIME) OR (#{endDate} = MS.ENDDATE AND #{endTime} > MS.STARTTIME) OR (MS.STARTDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) OR (MS.ENDDATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) )
AND NOT ( (#{startTime} >= MS.ENDTIME OR #{endTime} <= MS.STARTTIME) )
